page.title: 09LIFE STYLES DURLEY DENE
page.content: { { Type of House:}Villas and semi- detached villas built ten years ago. { Reasons for living here:}Easy commuting to Perth,village atmosphere and rural setting. { Leisure Activities:}Bowling green, Tennis club,Yoga club,W.I.,and a toddlers club.Many enjoy walking. { Shopping:}A Post Office,2 General stores and a newsagent are available but most people shop in Perth for better variety and lower prices. { Newspapers:}National-The "Sun".Local- The "Courier" and the "Perthshire Advertiser". { Church:}Dunbarney Church-very few people attend regularly. {Pets:}Goldfish,dogs,cats,bees,birds and hamsters.
